column4: I am running dapper on my oc and i know it has the accessruner drivers and i am using  a 'GeekADSL promax q31 ADSL modem' which is supported by these drivers, ubuntu can see the

I am running dapper on my oc and i know it has the accessruner drivers and i am using  a 'GeekADSL promax q31 ADSL modem' which is supported by these drivers, ubuntu can see the modem but i dont know how to access it and make it work, i tried pppoeconf but it wants an ethernet interface and im using usb so how do i setup my pppoe adsl
wastrel thats using pppoeconf which needs an ethernet interface i need to connect through usb
did you google for make model and ubuntu?
